title: TotalEnergies Could Sell Wind and Solar Assets to Reduce Debt
summary: French Big Oil major TotalEnergies is considering a divestment from some wind and solar power assets in Asia to reduce its debt load, Bloomberg reported today, citing unnamed sources. A potential sale could fetch several hundred million dollars, the sources told the publication. TotalEnergies is cu…

title: Energy Majors Warn EU Climate Push Could Gut Supply Security
summary: The European Union is putting its energy security at risk by attempting to regulate every single molecule of energy products it will import in 2027, the year in which the EU will ban Russian natural gas. title: Big Oil’s Billion-Dollar Bet on the Caspian Is Paying Off
summary: To identify the regions generating the most cash for majors, we forecast the group’s top five projects by cumulative free cash flow for the period 2025 to 2030. title: Argentina’s Vaca Muerta Shale Is Smashing Oil Production Records in 2025
summary: In a surprise development, Argentina’s unconventional oil production hit a new all-time high for September 2025. title: Oil major Chevron shifts focus to prioritise profits over production
summary: Business plan unveiled at investor day emphasises need to cut costs and lower capital expenditure

title: Oil and gas demand to rise for 25 years without global change of course, says IEA
summary: International energy watchdog sets out new scenario to reflect fading commitment to climate change
